learning_outcomes.description: Integrate the theoretical and practical application of the MRI safety questionnaire
Have an appreciation of the workflow patterns of a clinical MRI department
Demonstrate a basic understanding clinical scanning planes and protocols
Have an appreciation of the different imaging challenges with respect to well versus very ill patients

assessments.due_date: Due Friday 1400 the week following the last week of placement
assessments.task_description: Reflective journal, where the student reviews their time in the department and what they have learnt.
assessments.submission_guidelines: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 10% of the maximum possible mark will be deducted per 24 hours from time submission is due for up to 7 days. After 7 days, you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

assessments.due_date: Due Friday 1400 the week following the last week of placement
assessments.task_description: Site supervisor assessment where the site supervisor reports on the behaviour of the student during placement.
assessments.submission_guidelines: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 10% of the maximum possible mark will be deducted per 24 hours from time submission is due for up to 7 days. After 7 days, you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

assessments.due_date: Due Friday 1400 the week following the last week of placement
assessments.task_description: Student will present two case studies to their peers, demonstrating the important role MRI played in the management of the patient.
assessments.submission_guidelines: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 10% of the maximum possible mark will be deducted per 24 hours from time submission is due for up to 7 days. After 7 days, you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.
